entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries and rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
